   • Delayed Weapon Fire for 1 round

<color=#FFC926>Fortifies</color> all of your ships and 2 - 13 alliance ships. <color=#FFC926>Fortified</color> ships get +25% Critical Hit Damage and bonuses based on the receiving player's Titan-A research.

<color=#FFC926>Max Fortifies</color> all of your ships and 2 - 13 alliance ships. <color=#FFC926>Max Fortified</color> ships get all of the Fortified buffs, +250% base Damage, and further bonuses based on the receiving player's Titan-A research.
Your ship is currently cloaked. Cloaking ends when its duration expires, you enter combat, begin mining, or dock at a station.
<color=#FFC926>Reveals</color> up to 1 hostile hiding from your sensors in the currently occupied system, if no target is found the activation cost will be refunded.
Use this ability on a player ship to reveal the coordinates of their station.
Increases USS Titan Damage VS Hostiles Explorers
Increases Kos'Karii Damage VS Hostiles Interceptors
Reinforces other ships, vastly improving their combat performance vs Armadas based on their Defiant research.
Increases Velox Damage VS Hostiles Battleships

Charge the Borg Cutting Beam by dealing HHP Damage in regular combat. The higher the Borg Cube tier, the more HHP Damage must be dealt to charge the beam. If the Borg Cube docks, the Borg Cutting Beam loses its charge.

If you destroy a target with the Borg Cutting Beam, you are awarded Technological Distinctiveness. The higher the level of target destroyed, the more Technological Distinctiveness gained.

The Borg Cutting Beam may not be used against Player Stations, Alliance Starbases or Armada Targets.

Opens a <color=#FFC926>Spatial Rip</color> in the system the Gorn Eviscerator is currently in. Your ships and Alliance members can travel through it to any system within their <color=#FFC926>player grade</color>. Any ship that travels through a <color=#FFC926>Spatial Rip</color> is granted one free <color=#FFC926>instant recall</color>.

The Gorn Eviscerator can also instantly warp to any system within its warp range.

Upgrade the Gorn Eviscerator to increase the <color=#FFC926>duration</color> of Spatial Rips and <color=#FFC926>number of ships</color> that can travel through them, and to decrease the ability <color=#FFC926>cooldown</color>.

   • <color=#40FF60>+5000%</color> base damage increase

   • Delay enemy weapon fire for <color=#40FF60>8</color> rounds
